website_summaries.verdict: The best body pillow on the market right now. Maintains its shape and durability over time, making it a solid investment.
pros: Off the charts in terms of the comfort and support that it can provide
Stands out for its very large size, which caters to all body types
cons: A bit pricey, but the comfort it provides is well worth the price

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 2 of these pillows. The one my husband uses with his breathing equipment was used every night and you can tell that is is no longer firm, sagging in the bottom place of U - I would think that after paying 100.00 it would last at least a year, no?
customer_reviews.author: natalia

customer_reviews.title: Mine started to flatten after a week...
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited when I finally scraped together the money to buy one of these, in hopes that I would sleep more comfortably while pregnant. Unfortunately, while the product description says "assured never to flatten, clump, or lump"... that's exactly what this pillow did for me. Within ONE WEEK of use, the top part was starting to go flat and within two weeks had almost completely flattened!! That is NOT what I expect when paying $109 for a pillow. Pretty disappointed to say the least...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm sleeping better than I have in a long while
customer_reviews.text: A very well-made item and much bigger than the box it came in. If I'm using it, I tend to sleep better and for a longer period of time. When my lady uses it, it tries to shove me over to the edge of the bed and steal the covers. I don't think the pillow itself is totally to blame. She swears it's not her fault but I get the impression the two of them are in cahoots. There's something up, I just know it.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Purpose served
customer_reviews.text: So, I wish I didn't need this big worm. Yes, I call it the worm, but it has helped me a lot since having a horrendous car accident and breaking my back. I was awake at least 5-8 times a night before getting it, and it seemed to reduce my discomfort, because after I got it, I only awoke about 3-5 times/night. Also, if you get it, and you should if you need it, in spite of the price, go the complete distance3 and get the pillowcase made just for it. Do not get a cheap one. Get the u-shaped pillowcase that zips open on the complete outside for easy put-on and take-off.
customer_reviews.author: minmi

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, very dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this pillow for two weeks and the fabric has torn. For the cost I am very disappointed in the quality. Will be trying to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: Initially, this body pillow is great. It cradles your body and allows you to turn from side to side effortlessly. But after a month, it totally loses shape. The filling moves from the U part to the ends. Every few days i popped in the dryer as recommended and it would plump it a tad, but a month later, I’m putting it in the dryer daily to give the littlest volume to the U part supporting my head. Also, I washed the pillow case in cold and tumbled dry low and now it doesn’t fit.
customer_reviews.author: Make-Time-To-Travel

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this product
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product, but I didn't even get to try it. I opened the package and it stated it was compressed for shipping and to shake it to help decompress. I shook it and it ripped almost all the way around the middle of the U shape. Pretty disappointed in the quality for the price of the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Jwel09

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but heavy
customer_reviews.text: I’m still getting use to this pillow. I like that it pretty much stays put and doesn’t move unless I move it. It’s also comfortable and it can shift to different sides without readjusting anything. On the other hand, it’s heavy and takes effort to move it around each morning and night if you’re a bed maker like me. It also keeps in body heat so I feel almost too warm when sleeping. Overall I don’t regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Anne

customer_reviews.title: So much more comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I went with the more expensive pillow and can't say I tried any of the cheaper ones, but this has been a lifesaver already. I'm 19 weeks pregnant and sleeping so much better since I started using this pillow. I sleep with it upside down (u at the bottom of the bed instead of the top) so I am still using my normal pillow but this is nice having to prop my feet and legs on and cushion me all around. Recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen S

customer_reviews.title: Decent pillow, AWFUL pillow case
customer_reviews.text: So I like this pillow, it's comfortable, good firmness, and fits my body well, BUT the pillow case is SO scratchy and uncomfortable. I have to have some other cover on it (currently using a sheet) and the fact that I'm having to look into a different pillow case to spend even more money on irks me to no end. The pillow it's if good enough, but this darn pillow case....
customer_reviews.author: Channing

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but needs more filling
customer_reviews.text: It was amazing, for two nights. Then it flattened quite a bit. I fluff and adjust it, which helps, but wish it had a little more stuffing. Still, it has helped a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Lorinda S. Mckinnon

customer_reviews.title: Bought this in April it is now August and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in April it is now August and it is completely flat! I am so upset!!! When I first received it the pillow was big and fluffy and about two weeks later it began to break down. It's not worth the money at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best pillow
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this!!! I have lupus and fibromyalgia and when I’m in a flare my whole body hurts and I can never get comfortable. I used to sleep with pillows under my hips, knees and one in between my legs. They never stayed in place which was super annoying. This moonlight slumber stays in place all night and is SUPER comfortable. It’s fluffy and I didn’t have any problems with the pillow case after I put it in the dryer and I have super sensitive skin. Would recommend this to everyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Rose

customer_reviews.title: The best for back pain
customer_reviews.text: This is so comfy and worth every penny my worm !!! Helps me with my pain !!! Helps me not move that much at night wish you had more colors available!!!
customer_reviews.author: BELLA

customer_reviews.title: Why would you sell this without a cover
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was wierd that they were selling this white pillow without a cover, I thought there would be something to hide all the stains from drool etc, but this did not. there are so many better pillows with a darker tint or with pillow cases that seem to be much better.
customer_reviews.author: Nery Ralon

customer_reviews.title: It's also not particularly comfortable and the zipper arround the perimeter sucks and you ...
customer_reviews.text: Returned it. It's way narrower than I expected and the girl in the picture must be really short because it didn't even reach my knees (I'm 6' 1"). It's also not particularly comfortable and the zipper arround the perimeter sucks and you feel it when you throw your leg or arm around the thing. Back to the drawing board, looking for a new body pillow. My big gripe with my current body pillow is it's too heavy and is difficult to toss from one side of me to the other which is why I tried the one I'm reviewing here. I'd like something large and firm but not heavy. Suggestions anyone?
customer_reviews.author: dliguori25

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic pillow..
customer_reviews.text: I love my Comfort U pillow. I have fibromyalgia, TMD and disc problems in my lower back. I had a steroid injection in my lower back the morning it arrived and I slept like a baby. It arrived before I expected it and I was thrilled. If you're on the ledge about buying one like I was, get it today! It's amazing !! I think I'm going to be fighting my springer for a space in the "cocoon" it makes..
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Hammock Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I have a hammock that I use as my couch and my bed. This pillow is really nice to throw into the hammock and sit in the middle of when you are reading or on your laptop. It provides a back cushion to make you upright and the rest of the pillow on either side of you acts as armrests. I prefer to take the pillow out to sleep as I like to sleep nice and cool but it is comfortable and I have fell asleep plenty of times with the pillow in the hammock. If you like to spend time in a hammock try this pillow out. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: SwimSometimes

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: My first few nights, I loved this. Multiple back surgeries this pillow gives a lot of support. But these are the problems. Way too big for a Queen bed. If you get hot during the night, this design keeps heat around your body; too hot for me. My biggest complaint, the cover design where it zips digs into where your neck/head goes. The support was good but too many faults.
customer_reviews.author: denise p.

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow for back support
customer_reviews.text: This is not a very dense fluffy pillow. But i believe it serves its purpose for support. Im 6'2 225lbs and its plenty of pillow for me. The only thing that takes getting used to is turning over at night. You are a pretzel in the pillow and you have to move alot more out of your way to rotate or get out of bed with it under the covers. Its a little overpriced considering the quality but in the end it does its job and seems to be holding up.
customer_reviews.author: pbl57lsu

customer_reviews.title: Ordered for a friend that has back problems
customer_reviews.text: It has been quite some time since I ordered this product, yet my best friend tells me every time she talks to me that she loves this pillow. She tells me it is more than just a pillow. She uses it for great comfort for her back. I highly recommend this pillow for others.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: I'm not prego, never have been but I like a pillow between my knees and one up against my back. This does both!! I'm single and it serves as a good "big spoon." Takes a lot of the bed up so not sure I'd recommend for anyone that sleeps with another human...and likes to snuggle. Of course, if you have a significant other, this item becomes less needed, right!?! My dogs LOVE it and shtoink it if I get up for even a second!!
customer_reviews.author: Kpg

customer_reviews.title: ) I am 6' 2" and 220lbs and this pillow is UNBELEIVABLY COMFORTABLE for me

customer_reviews.author: BigToe

customer_reviews.title: lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I've had terrible nausea and vomiting since 5 weeks into my pregnancy. Nights were terrible because every position caused strain on my stomach muscles in one way or another. This pillow has helped me significantly to fall asleep quickly and stay asleep through most of the night. Expensive, but worth every penny. I am also a natural stomach sleeper and this has helped the transition to side sleeping breezy. My husband hates that it blocks the cuddles, but he uses the side closest to him every night between his knees to sleep better. Also helps keep me cool through the night. A must-have in my book.
customer_reviews.author: MCme

customer_reviews.title: This is the best body pillow ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best body pillow ever! I'm not pregnant and dont plan to be, but I am the worst sleeper ever. I toss and turn a lot which causes me to wake up 50 times a night which then makes me feel terrible the next day. With this pillow on the other hand, I am so perfectly snug! I sleep soundly through the whole night with out tossing or turning or waking up. Its a life saver for me! If somehow I ruin it or wear it out I will buy another for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Does the job

It is long enough that she can place it between her legs all the way to her ankles - plus she can flop to the other side and still be comfortable. Although watching her climb out of bed in the morning is a somewhat hilarious event as she is surrounded by this moat of pillow. Our bed is queen size - and there isn't much room for me. I figure this is a temporary issue.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: very nice. I have recently moved to sleeping on back ...
customer_reviews.text: It's seems an expensive investment for a pillow, but it really has improved my sleep posture and helped my back so far! I started using it sleeping on my side with the bottom of the U (upside down U) under my head and the side between my knees and arms, very nice. I have recently moved to sleeping on back and turned the pillow so it is in standard U position, with the bottom of the U under my knees. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my u pillow!

customer_reviews.author: lkd

customer_reviews.title: Helps with my RA and FIbromyalgia pain
customer_reviews.text: Best support I’ve found for my RA and Fibromyalgia. I use it with bottom of U at my feet. Only one I’ve found the supports back and gives support between knees and ankles with my legs straight. Helps alleviate hip pain. I’m 5’2”.
customer_reviews.author: Dogmom55

customer_reviews.title: Pain free
customer_reviews.text: I am a side sleeper. Was having hip pain, shoulder pain and neck pain. All have gone away. No more tossing back and forth for relief. Love my pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome

The only cons are that it takes up a lot of room (my poor husband), and the head/neck area gets a little lumpy. I would LOVE this pillow if they made it with latex foam!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Bocken

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is so amazingly amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I L.O.V.E. this pillow. I am a sleeper who does not stay in one position throughout the night. I start out on my side and usually end up on my back or on the other side. Since purchasing this pillow, I have not rolled around or experienced the restlessness that normally accompanies sleep for me. I have, in the past week, gotten 6+ hours of continuous sleep. It comes with a white pillowcase so there is no need to purchase an additional one unless you are going for a specific color scheme or want something of higher quality. Overall, I love this pillow and couldn't imagine sleeping without it!
customer_reviews.author: Onaje Oladuwa

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive my new pillow but when I opened it I was disappointed to realize that the advertising is deceiving. This is not a solid pillow as the description implies but it is actually a maternity pillow that is three different pieces stuffed into one pillow case. This creates empty space where the 3 pillows meet and I am concerned that these dips will become much more pronounced over time. I definately think that somewhere in the description it should note that this is not in fact one giant U shaped pillow but rather 3 smaller pillows stuffed into one pillow case.
customer_reviews.author: jlynne

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought me this pillow because he works overseas most of the year. I cannot thank him enough lol. I haven't had this good of sleep in forever! I have found the pillow of all pillows! So comfortable and you can bend it into so many different shapes. My adult son loved it so much we got him his own. The only thing I was bummed about was when he got his pillow it had a pillowcase in it. Mine did not come with a pillowcase. Is mine just missing or did he get one by mistake?
customer_reviews.author: Porfirio Rivera

customer_reviews.title: I'm five months pregnant and typically a back sleeper. ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm five months pregnant and typically a back sleeper. This pillow is firm enough to keep me from rolling onto my back in the middle of the night, but soft enough that I don't wake up sore and I can move it to fit under my belly and between my knees. I don't know how I would get any sleep during this pregnancy if I didn't have this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Kara P.

customer_reviews.title: I've had this pillow for 5 months and I love it. it totally cradles you
customer_reviews.text: I've had this pillow for 5 months and I love it. it totally cradles you. I purchased it due to getting a full knee replacement and needed to sleep on my back in the beginning and was able to keep my leg elevated with this pillow while being cradled. now I use it every night.
customer_reviews.author: Mack

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this pillow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my back as I sleep

customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: The Best Ever!!!

This pillow does exactly what I need it to do. Love, love, love this pillow.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap

customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift to an expectant mother. She raves about it!

customer_reviews.author: Diana Bush

customer_reviews.title: When I couldn't get comfortable, this did the trick.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this pillow during my pregnancy. I got it at around six months and never stopped using it. The pillow case is easy to remove and wash, doesn't shrink and is easy to put back on. My on,y complaint is that the pillow lost its fluffiness relatively quickly, at the part where I laid my head. I compensated for it by using my own pillows on top. The part of the pillow where I wrapped my legs stayed ok. I think it's worth getting.
customer_reviews.author: Metuka

customer_reviews.title: I call it the Pillow Fort- Girl pillow heaven!!!

I have it packed away now waiting for round 2.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Riggins

customer_reviews.title: This is a GREAT pillow!

It comes with a pillow case, but I ordered an extra one so I can change it when I change my bed.
customer_reviews.author: dixiegal97603

customer_reviews.text: I really like this pillow. It feels like sleeping in a cocoon. This is the only setup that has helped me sleep on my back.
customer_reviews.author: WendyH

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money for preggos!

You cuddle it in the front and it cuddles you from behind and gives you the support you need for neck, tummy, arms, legs, and back. It was high in price but it's been the best and totally worth the money. Only problem now is the amount of space it takes up while I don't need it when I'm not pregnant
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Save your money...

The part that lay next to the edge of the bed always fell off, no matter how I adjusted it. Returned it after two weeks of trying to make it work and got my money back.
customer_reviews.author: jllapka

customer_reviews.title: Great support
